title: $2500-2/1 South Ft Lauderdale House-Beautiful Renovation-Fenced Yard
neighborhood: SW Ft Lauderdale - South of Marina Mile Blvd-East of I-95
posting_body: ['Fantastic opportunity to rent this home just minutes away from everything.', 'Close to the beaches, I95, the Turnpike, Ft. Lauderdale/Hollywood airport, and shopping.', 'Newly renovated and completely updated...tile floors throughout, open kitchen has granite counters, new stainless steel appliances, and new shaker cabinets.', 'Updated bathroom with all new amenities.', 'New impact glass windows and storm doors, new 2 ton A/C unit (5) Remote control ceiling fans with LED lights smoke, and carbon monoxide detectors.', 'New washer and dryer.', 'Spacious fenced-in backyard with concrete patio area great for grilling or just chilling.', 'Pets ok w/ landlord approval.', 'THIS IS A YEARLY LEASE – NOT SHORT TERM.', 'Landlord requires First Month, Last Month and Security Deposit to move in (3 month’s rent).', ' Acceptable credit score/report for all persons on the lease (650+), background check and PROOF of income showing sustained combined incomes at least 2.5-3 times the amount of the monthly rent.', 'Must have no judgments or money owed to previous landlords.', 'Dianne Warren,', 'show contact info', ', Beachfront Realty.', ' Map view is approximate, not exact, for security reasons.', 'Please CALL to view this property.', ' No texts or emails for first contact.', ' Private owner property.']
